After Sales+Service Management+Service T.EXPLANATION: Percentage of service progress tracked accurately against the actual service status, reflecting the reliability of the service tracking system.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.FORMULA: (Number of Accurately Tracked Services / Total Number of Services) * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Service T.EXPLANATION: Measure of how well customers can view the progress of their service appointments, including updates on service status and completion estimates.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.FORMULA: (Number of Services with Visible Progress / Total Number of Services) * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Service T.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to customer inquiries or requests for updates on service progress, reflecting the responsiveness of the service tracking system.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.FORMULA: Average Time to Respond to Service Tracking Requests

After Sales+Service Management+Service T.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the information and updates provided about service progress, collected through post-service surveys.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Service Tracking

After Sales+Service Management+Service T.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to track service progress for each customer, including system maintenance and administrative expenses.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.FORMULA: Total Cost of Service Tracking / Total Number of Customers

After Sales+Service Management+Service T.KPIS: Service tracking compliance with service level agreements.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.EXPLANATION: Degree to which service tracking processes meet the agreed-upon service levels and commitments, measured through audits and performance evaluations.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.FORMULA: (Number of Services Tracked Complying with SLAs / Total Number of Tracked Services) * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Service T.EXPLANATION: Rate at which improvements are made to the efficiency of the service tracking process, measured by changes in response times, accuracy, and customer satisfaction.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.FORMULA: (Number of Efficiency Improvements in Service Tracking / Total Number of Service Tracking Activities) * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Service T.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from service tracking enhancements.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from improvements made to the service tracking process compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Service Management+Service T.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Service Tracking Enhancements / Total Cost of Service Tracking Enhancements) * 100
